txt.en: 'The Ethuilwereth has started in Duillond; join the Elves for merry-making and dancing!'
'The Shire celebrates Yule with a Festival Run. Race for the prize!'
'The dwarves of Thorin's Hall are celebrating their Springfest; join them at the Thorin's Hall inn!'
'Join the inhabitants of Bree in their famous Yule feast at the Festival Grounds!'
'Those looking to pay their respects to Bullroarer Took should visit Sigismond North-took in Brockenborings!'
'The Dwarves of Thorin's Hall invite you to join their Yule festivities!'
'Travellers report beautiful flowers in full bloom near Bree-town, Michel Delving and Celondim!'
'The Elves of Duillond invite you to join them in celebrating the beauty of winter.'
'The Elf-lord Elrond has sent forth Heralds in search of the lost Ring-lore of Eregion!'
'Heralds of Rivendell have been sent forth to locations throughout Eriador!'
'It is said a shadow is growing in the East, and the Dark Lord has returned to his tower far away....'
'By the command of Amarthiel, Servants of the Enemy have begun a great search for the Ring-lore of the Eregion!'
'Have you heard that some dwarves have begun a journey to pass into the Mines of Moria? Some say it is a fool's errand, for ominous legends surround that place....'
'A desperate search has begun to recover the long lost Ring-lore of Eregion!'
'If the dwarf-expedition succeeds in Moria, who knows what treasures could be uncovered?'
'Only the bravest or most foolhardy adventurer would dare to pass beyond the Hollin Gate into Moria, for it is a dark place beset by many evils.'
'Riders crossing the Brandywine have spotted mariners camped nearby the bridge! No boat was seen nearby!'
'Word has been received from Tinnudir that an expected barge carrying much needed cargo is long over due!'
'Fishermen have reported spotting the debris of a foundered ship scattered along the banks of the Brandywine!'
'Summerdays has opened at the Bree-fields party grounds!'
'The Lithe Festival has begun near Hobbiton at the old Party Tree!'
'The Festival of Enedhin has started in Duillond!'
'The dwarves of Thorin's Hall are celebrating their Summerfest!'
'The Inn League of the Shire is looking for new members!'
'Try your hand at guessing which is the fastest hobbit and dwarf in all of Middle-earth!'
'Lalia's Market is now open in Bree!'
'Have you visited Lalia's Market lately? Visit Bree for all your threaded needs.'
'Lalia's Market is a market like no other. Outfits beyond compare.'
'Visit Lalia's Market in Bree today for the finest clothing in all of Middle-earth!'
'The Harvestmath has opened at the Bree-fields party grounds!'
'The Harvest Festival has begun near Hobbiton at the old Party Tree!'
'The vile False King, Mordirith, has returned to Angmar and threatens to crush what little resistance remains in that horrible land!'
'The Iavasmereth has started in Duillond!'
'Mordirith, long thought defeated, has returned to Angmar and rules once more in the Witch-king's name!'
'The dwarves of Thorin's Hall are celebrating their Autumnfest!'
'Desperate warriors are struggling to hold back Angmar's vicious assaults against the Free Peoples!'
'The Hobbits of the Shire report a fine harvest. Join their feasting at the Party Tree in Hobbiton!
'The village of Aughaire is struggling to bear up on the continued assaults of Angmar and has asked for all able warriors to come to its defence!'
'Test your horsemanship by running the Bree Derby or All-Shire Run!'
'The Spring Planting has started in Bree! Avery Crabapple is looking for assistance near the Bree Boar Fountain!'
'Yule is here and so is the time for celebration! Join with your friends and kindred at the Party Tree in Hobbiton!'
'The Feast of the Greenfields has begun in the Shire!'
'Happy Yule! Enjoy a winter horse-race at the Bree-land Festival Grounds.'
